work.name: DoubleQ
work.summary: Results-driven Front-End Developer with 2.5 + years of expertise in React.js and UI/UX design, adept at translating design concepts into seamless, visually appealing interfaces, now incorporating 3D technologies to enhance user experiences.

work.name: SEVN Studios
work.summary: Detail-oriented Front-End Developer with foundational skills in TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, JSX, CSS, and SCSS. Proficient in React.js, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Bootstrap. Collaborative team player with a focus on translating design ideas into responsive and user-friendly interfaces for seamless digital experiences.

Collaborative team player with a focus on translating design ideas into responsive and user-friendly interfaces for seamless digital experiences.

volunteer.summary: Assisted in fundraising campaigns, contributing to the organization's ability to provide essential resources to those in need.

awards.summary: Awarded for consistently completing projects with exceptional quality and efficiency, demonstrating a high level of expertise and dedication to meeting project goals and deadlines.
